item.title: Warning labels on menopause treatments 'scare women,' doctors tell the FDA

item.title: New research suggests a way to prevent the spread of Malaria
item.description: A new study reports on a novel way to short-circuit the parasite that spreads Malaria, so people wouldn't get infected with a mosquito's bite.
